channel.title: Drops go off?
channel.description: well drops go off at random times on my server and npcs drop nothing..is there a command so that it puts it back on like dodian where all the npcs die and the drops go back on..

item.title: Drops go off?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

hmm so if i do that and leave serv on for long time npcs still drop things? because if i leave it up for like 1 hours npcs dont drop anymore lol…and don’t see dropsrandom or actiontimer in drops.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Drops go off?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

mine was like that… in my client i searched dropsrandom and it had a
actiontime = 50

and i just removed that area. I have also seen that in some servers if u search random in any of the drops.java or drops.cfg and all u can find a aciton timer thing. hope i helped

Read full topic
